OOC: You're probably better off putting your reply at the top instead 
of the bottom.  Messages can get cut off once in a while, and it's a 
good habit to make sure your response isn't turned into an accidental 
cliffhanger.

<Just one moment, my fellow Predacon.>  Empath sends the message 
telepathically.  <Stinger, is it?  We need to talk.>  She banks into 
a circling pattern over Stinger's position.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "lady_night_shade04" <lady_night_shade04@y...> 
wrote:

> Stinger looked around. "Where the slag am I?" She sighed and 
> transformed back into beast mode and started to walk into the woods.
